about_the_game:
Enhance your journey with downloadable content designed for our most dedicated fans.

Digital Art Book:
Dive deeper into the visual splendor of Ghostboy with our beautifully crafted Digital Art Book. This 85-page digital collection, available in PDF format, features stunning concept art, character designs, and behind-the-scenes sketches that showcase the artistic process behind the game's development. Perfect for art enthusiasts and fans who want a closer look at the creative minds behind the game.

Soundtrack:
Relive the most emotional moments of Ghostboy with our original soundtrack!
The soundtrack contains 20 high-quality tracks of the game's music, along with track titles and metadata for easy import into your favorite music device or service.

Track List:
"Start your journey"
"The Accident"
"The First Wave"
"The House"
"Brother's theme"
"Mother's theme"
"Father's theme"
"Puzzle Master"
"The Clock"
"Haunted Painting"
"Funeral"
"Boardgame"
"Machine of Patience"
"Marionett"
"Christmas before"
"Chrismtas after"
"The Pirate"
"Fatherstein"
"Haunted Paintings"
"Final Goodbye"

content_descriptors.notes: The story is about a family who lost a child in an accident. That means it depicts grief and the mental illneses that can be developed because of that.
